name: mud-shot
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. It also reduces the target’s Speed.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. It also reduces the target’s Speed.
